details.p: If you're having any issues on Safari or iOS in general, please do me a favor and help me diagnose errors. I do not have access to my own Mac, and I desperately need the help.
If you don't already have the console enabled, and you're on a Mac:

ul.li: In the menubar at the top, navigate to Safari → Preferences
At the bottom, enable Show features for web developers

details.p: You should then be able to open the console by navigating, in the menubar, to Develop → Show JavaScript Console, or pressing cmd + option + c.
